title: FireBootCamp Mini Enterprise Xamarin (2 Day Essentials) - Redmond
thumbnailDescription: FireBootCamp Mini Enterprise Xamarin (2 Day Essentials) - Redmond
eventShortDescription:
FireBootCamp Mini: Enterprise Xamarin Cross-platform Development (2 Day Essentials)

Everyone has a mobile device. If you’re writing applications for the enterprise and want to supply native applications so that your users get the best experience, as well as a web application to ensure you get the best possible reach, this is the course for you.

In this intense 2 day course we will cover the essentials of enterprise development, and the best way to build native cross-platform applications that get you maximum code re-use. At FireBootCamp Mini: Enterprise Xamarin Cross-platform Development (2 Day Essentials) we’ll jam the greatest hits of our 4 week boot camp into just 2 days: dependency injection, unit testing, loosely coupled cross-platform architecture, design patterns like Repository and Unit of Work, iOS and Android Fundamentals, Azure Mobile Services and Mobile Best Practices.
​
